project.name: |-- 001-basic-io
project.description:
Keywords: + FileSystem, FileSystems + Path, Paths + Files + DirectoryStream + walkFileTree + File copy, move
This project includes very simple examples involving the new IO API.
FileSystemAndPathsRunner: Demonstrates how to use some FileSystem and Path methods without creating files or directories.
CreateFilesAndDirsRunner: Demonstrates how to create and delete files and directories.
ListDirContentsRunner: Demonstrates how to list the immediate contents of file, how to manually list recursively a directory, and how to do it with the new JDK7 API.
CopyAndMoveFilesRunner: Demonstrates how to copy and move files.
